text.emotional: There are no discernible prints on these bags. They yield no further clues. You can get them at any supermarket. According to the cashier, everyone among the townsfolk procures them.
text.silence: {.} there are no discernible prints on these bags {....} they yield no further clues {....} you can get them at {.} any supermarket {....} according to the cashier {....} everyone among the townsfolk procures them {...}
